content: That's really helpful, thanks for the info. I was thinking of staying in an Airbnb in Kyoto, but now I'm worried about the crowds and prices. Do you think it's worth considering a smaller town or city nearby, like Nara or Himeji, instead? I've been trying to improve my Japanese language skills for my students at the language school in Roppongi, but I'm not sure how much I'll be able to communicate with locals in these smaller towns.
